bug.title: Drag and Drop of items with max itemStack bellow 64 from QIO System
bug.body: #### Issue description: When dragging an item that the max itemStack is bellow 64, it will actually drag 64. This is not a problem tho, as I can click on my inventory and it will only get the actual max itemStack of the item. But, if I drop the item on the ground instead of my inventory, I will get more than the possible max itemStack of the item (in this example, 64) #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Open your QIO System, put 64 upgrades from the same type (Speed Upgrade, for example) 2. Retrieve those 64 speed upgrades with a Drag and Drop, but don't drop it on your inventory, instead, click out of the inventory box to drop it on the ground [link to image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/554379889122213890/743236932754210877/unknown.png?width=447&height=406) 3. The 64 stack will go right into your inventory [link to image](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/554379889122213890/743237272903876618/unknown.png?width=442&height=419) #### Version: **Forge:** v1.16.1-32.0.88 **Mekanism:** v10.0.8.431 **Other relevant version:**

bug.title: Comparator reading any bin makes it output a ridiculous redstone power level
bug.body: #### Issue description: The vanilla comparator reads a redstone power value higher than 15 when connected to a bin holding 69 or more items in it. This causes a major problem when trying to use a comparator to get the bin mostly full and turn off some production process. It will instead fill it to less than a stack because by then the level is already close to 15. Full bin Redstone Powers are below. Basic: 897 Advanced: 1,793 Elite: 7,169 Ultimate: 57,345 Creative: 469,726,049 #### Steps to reproduce: 1.place any tier Mekanism bin and fill it with 69 or more items. 2.place a comparator to read one of the sides of the bin. 3.look at the output face of the comparator with the player reticule 4.The One Probe will tell you the Redstone Power level the comparator is outputting. Things to note: 1.The comparator still works like it should comparing and subtracting, so a basic bin with 69 items in it will output a RP of 16 but in substract mode with RP15 side input it will output RP1. Or the pictures below showing the full basic bin with the comparator in subtract mode. 897-15=882 ![2020-08-12_05 45 33](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8132047/90020697-0ad8a800-dc65-11ea-89ce-fd2e944646a3.png) ![2020-08-12_05 45 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8132047/90020606-eda3d980-dc64-11ea-9334-ff2acb7fcb3f.png) 2.Redstone dust immediately truncates the RP down to a max of 15. 3.A Block between the comparator and the bin does not truncate the signal, it reads the same value. 4.comparators are able to chain the value together, and even use that as a side input. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): Forge: 32.0.106 Mekanism,Additions,Generators,Tools-1.16.1-10.0.8.431 TheOneProbe-1.16-3.0.1-beta

bug.title: Industrial Alarm Delay In Turning Off
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Industrial Alarm has a delay to turn off have second time on #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Turn On Alarm With Redstone 2. Turn Off Alarm With Redstone 3.Turn On Alarm With Redstone 4. bug.title: Modification Station leaves behind unusable block spaces when rotated via Configurator
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: A Modification Station rotated by wrench leaves behind some kind of entity in the secondary block space (the part that moves from block to block while it is being rotated). No blocks can be placed in this space unless an op command is used to revert it to air, but it can be waterlogged. This block remains bugged if the station is removed without rotating back to the original position first. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place a Modification Station 2. Use a Configurator in wrench mode to rotate it to any facing other than the original. 3. The block to the right of where it was originally aimed at to be placed is now bugged, and removing the station makes it permanent. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 32.0.106 **Mekanism:** 10.0.8.431 ![2020-08-10_10 35 01](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6802445/89807551-08a40b80-daf6-11ea-93a2-da9095084613.png) ![2020-08-10_10 35 07](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6802445/89807604-1b1e4500-daf6-11ea-8503-a80dc1d4e6ff.png) ![2020-08-10_10 35 50](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6802445/89807615-21142600-daf6-11ea-9b1b-74a701db24ec.png) ![2020-08-10_10 36 11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6802445/89807660-2ffad880-daf6-11ea-918a-189090d01ad2.png)

bug.title: Plastic slabs take extremely long to mine and some double slabs only drop 1 slab
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Tools used: primarily obsidian paxel. Some slabs were also tested with an obsidian pickaxe, diamond pickaxe, or wooden pickaxe, with no change in results. Slab varieties tested: All vanilla slabs, all Mekanism plastic slab varieties. All slabs were tested as single and double slabs. Results, mining speed: All vanilla slabs except warped and crimson break almost instantly with obsidian tools. When Mekanism plastic slabs are mined with a pickaxe, paxel, or other mining tool of any unenchanted speed, their time to be broken is extremely long, nearly as long as an obsidian block mined with an unenchanted diamond pickaxe, and no faster than when broken by bare hand. This applies to both single and double slab forms of the blocks. Results, drops: All single slabs drop 1 slab upon breaking. All vanilla double slabs drop 2 slabs. All standard Mekanism plastic double slabs drop 2 slabs. All glow and transparent plastic double slabs drop 1 slab. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place all varieties of the game's slabs in the world in slab and double slab form, empty player inventory 2. Break slabs with a mining tool, noting the time taken for blocks to be broken. 3. Some double slabs will yield 2 slabs when broken, some will yield 1. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 32.0.106 **Mekanism:** 10.0.8.431

bug.title: All paxels break melons/pumpkins slowly
bug.body: ### Issue description: Although melons and pumpkins (and carved pumpkins) break faster with axes as the main tool, paxels from mekanism tools break them as slow as an empty hand would. ### Steps to reproduce: break melon/pumpkin blocks with *any* paxel. ### Versions: Forge: 32.0.69 Mekanism: 10.0.3.426 Mekanism Tools: 10.0.3.426 ### Possible fix: I don't know if this is a problem with forge or mekanism, but you can add hard-coded checks similar to the snow blocks or other materials.

bug.title: Silk Touch Meka-Tool produces exp orbs
bug.body: #### Issue description: Breaking ore blocks with a silk touch-enabed Meka-Tool produces both the block of ore, and the exp you would get for breaking it without silk touch. This is repeatable for effectively free exp. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Install and enable a Silk Touch Unit on a Meka-Tool 2. Break a block of ore that normally drops items. (Coal, redstone, diamond, quartz, etc) #### Version: **Forge:** 32.0.106 **Mekanism:** 10.0.8.431 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1637936/89420137-4a9d0e00-d700-11ea-8d89-2dede497f699.png)

bug.title: Unable to extract empty gas tank item from a gas tank placed as a block
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Unable to extract empty gas tank item from a gas tank placed as a block #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place down empty gas tank 2. Insert gas tank full of ethylene into the red slot and wait for it to transfer 3. Attempt to extract the empty gas tank #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 31.2.30 **Mekanism:** 1.15.2-9.10.9.422 **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) https://gist.github.com/MuteTiefling/eb28915fa59f112be3923216884d76cc I've attempted to extract with hoppers, PneumaticCraft Drones, and logistical transporters. I've tried configuring all sides for either input or output. Nothing works. Once a tank is inserted into the red slot, I can't get it out other than manually. https://streamable.com/goiejn

bug.title: Mekanism v10 crashing on startup
bug.body: I'm using Forge 32.0.98 on Minecraft 1.16.1 and the only mod I'm trying to run is Mekanism 10.0.6.429 Here is the crash log: https://pastebin.com/qUnhrjmh

bug.title: QIO Dupe/Item Loss
bug.body: #### Issue description: Moving drives around in QIO overwrites drive contents of one drive with that of another #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place two drives into QIO 2. Pick one up on to cursor 3. Click on the other drive a few times 4. Place held drive back into QIO (maybe unneeded) 5. The contents of one drive will completely overwrite the other. If you place a drive into slot 1 and another into slot 2 then pick up slot 1 and repeatedly click on drive 2 it will overwrite one of the drives with the contents of the other. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** forge-1.16.1-32.0.75 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.16.1-10.0.3.426 **Other relevant version:** Running in SMP, did not test single player Did not see an open issue reporting this. If it's fixed in dev then sorry! It was just really awkward losing all of the items in my supermassive drive, and this is something that's pretty easy to abuse after figuring it out.

bug.title: Digital Miner deletes items when auto-pull is enabled
bug.body: 1. Place a digital miner with some itemstack filter and require replace enabled (use netherack as a replacement block for example) 2. Place a any container containing stacks of the replacement block (netherack) on top of the digital miner 3. Turn on auto-pull 4. Start the digital miner **Forge:** 32.0.67 **Mekanism:** 10.0.0.3

Create world 2. /mek build boiler 3. add boiler valve 4. connect creative fluid tank with water 5. connect resistev heater to boiled edge with creative energy cube 6. look at superheating element Video with this steps: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zyy9InfAHrU #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): 1.16.1 **Forge:** 32.0.93 **Mekanism:** 10.0.5.428 **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. bug.title: Issue regarding infusing types
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Excess infusing types are unable to be inserted after filling the bar completely,(or) they are able to be inserted even if the bar is slightly empty, making is very bad for automation #### Steps to reproduce: 1.grab an infuser, fill it to the brim with infusing material 2.if it's completely filled it doesn't accept any more excess infusing items to stay in the slot 3.if it's even partially empty ( try an enriched alloy which uses up 10) then it can take a stack excess into the slot #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 32.0.71 **Mekanism:** 10.0.3 **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. bug.title: Logistic sorter RR no longer functioning in v10
bug.body: #### Issue description: When enabling RR on a logistic sorter directly connected off of a regular chest, logistic sorter stops pulling and pushing items. Turn off RR and items will start moving items again. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Put down a standard chest 2. Attach logistic sorter directly to standard chest. 3. Connect the logistic sorter to other inventories (such as two other standard chests, two other bins, chest and a stock minecraft block like a dispenser, etc...) or even just a single inventory 4. Enable RR [See Video]( https://youtu.be/3V7_HYReYNo) #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 32.0.75 **Mekanism:** 10.0.3.426

bug.body: meka tool cancels breaking of a block when being recharged by for example the meka suit 1. mine a block that wont get insta mined like energy cells obsidian etc 2. have the suit recharge it while ur mining blocks 3. mine blocks **Forge:** 32.0.71 **Mekanism:** -1.16.1-10.0.3.426.jar

bug.title: Electrolytic Breathing Unit not working when sprinting
bug.body: When Using the MekaSuit helmet with the Electrolytic Breathing Unit it will work if stood up fully under water, however when sprinting it will stop functioning when you are too short,

bug.title: Fission Reactor Ports not able to be connected to power.
bug.body: #### Issue description: It seems that fission Reactor Ports will not connect to power under any configuration. The description makes it seems like this should be a possibility. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Build a fission reactor 2. Add a reactor port 3. Place universal power cable next to port 4. Change config of port 5. No configuration allows for power output Mekanism v10

bug.title: Stack count doesn't update within a hand-held personal chest
bug.body: #### Issue description: When a personal chest is opened from the hot-bar, and a stack from inventory is merged to an existing one within the personal chest, the increased stack count doesn't save when the chest is closed. This issue only appears to exist when the chest is opened from the hot-bar. Placing the chest and performing these steps does not reproduce the issue. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place an item within the personal chest: a steel ingot, for example. 2. Place another steel ingot - or stack of steel ingots - on top of that single steel ingot within the personal chest. 3. Close out of the personal chest. 4. Open the personal chest again. 5. The stack will be reverted to the single steel ingot: ignoring what you added. #### Version: 1.16.1 **Forge: 1.16.1-forge-32.0.69** **Mekanism: Mekanism-1.16.1-10.0.2.425**

bug.title: BoilerValidator crashes server/client when boiler is built
bug.body: #### Issue description: Once a boiler is built on the server, the client connections are closed with a buffer-overflow exception or a generic connection close. On single-player, the client crashes. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. For the bottom layer, place 3x3 blocks of boiler casing. 2. For the second layer, place a pressure disperser in the middle with a pressure valve next to it on any side. Fill in the other 7 blocks with boiler casing. 3. For the top layer, place 3x3 blocks of boiler casing. 4. When the last block of boiler casing is placed, the server / client should crash. #### Version: 1.16.1 **Forge: 1.16.1-forge-32.0.69** **Mekanism: Mekanism-1.16.1-10.0.2.425** ### Server crash log ``` bug.title: SPS core renders multiple times per sps if multiple of them are seen
bug.body: #### Issue description: While there are multiple working sps rendered each one has as many rendered lightning + core groups as there are sps rendered. ![2020-07-19_20 25 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38815969/87882655-d37a3100-ca01-11ea-8983-305a25d686a7.png) #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Build a sps 2. Make it run 3. Do both again 4. look one as many directions as possible while keeping the other one on the screen #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 32.0.67 **Mekanism:** d77fd2d **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. Please make sure that it isn't set to expire.]

bug.title: Upgrading QIO Drives gets rid of the contents stored inside
bug.body: Reported on discord. I have not had a chance to verify/look into this yet though. This issue is to make that I don't forget to look into it.

bug.title: SPS disconnecting power when connecting more ports
bug.body: #### Issue description: A sps sometimes doesn't accept power from all ports with supercharged coils. I built one, and after leaving the world and loading it back up one of the ports doesn't accept energy anymore, at also visually has no lightning anymore, but its not just visual, also the processing speed is slowed down. This seems to only happen when all ports are supplied with alot of energy. Here before placing an energy source the coil on the left has a lightning and transfers energy ![2020-07-18_19 20 59](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38815969/87858254-ea028880-c92c-11ea-875c-1fcc3e7c6bd8.png) here after placing it it does neither ![2020-07-18_19 21 02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38815969/87858274-08688400-c92d-11ea-996f-2faf0c85335d.png) #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Build an sps with a port and a supercharged coil on all four sides, and two ports without for polonium in and antimatter out on the top. 2. leave the world 3. load back into the world 4. see some coils(i had sometimes one and sometimes two) no longer working 5. play around with placing and breaking creative energy cubes next to the ports and notice strange behavior. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 32.0.67 **Mekanism:** 7e131d9 **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. Please make sure that it isn't set to expire.]

bug.title: Mekanism-1.16.1-10.0.1.424 incompatible with Angel ring mod
bug.body: #### Issue description: Mekanism V10 latest version prevents creative-like flight mods from functioning. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Install Mekanism latest version 2. Install any angel ring mod 3. Use ring to fly. 4. Flight will not work. #### Versions **Forge:** forge-32.0.66 **Mekanism:** 1.16.1-10.0.1.424 **Other relevant version:** MC 1.16.1 **Angel Ring Mod used Angel Ring v1.3.0 [1.16.1]. Issue also tested with: **AzureDooms Angel Ring 1.16.1-1.0.2 Issue was also open in parallel on the Angel Ring Mod author GitHub Page. https://github.com/DenisMasterHerobrine/AngelRing/issues/9 No crash log to show. Bug does not cause crashes.

bug.title: Portable Teleporter not working
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: It is currently not possible to use the Portable Teleporter on private frequencies, because the Teleport button is always shown dark grey, with the reason "No Link" at the top left. This seems to be caused by either c086ae1 or fd225f0. I verified this by testing the same thing with the 218e3f6 branch i had from yesterday, and then testing it with the updated fd225f0 branch, and the first time it worked, the second time it didn't. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Setup a Teleporter 2. Get a Portable Teleporter 3. Set it to the frequency of the Teleporter 4. See a dark Teleport button #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 32.0.63 **Mekanism:** fd225f0 & 526eaf2 **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. Please make sure that it isn't set to expire.]

bug.title: Dupe glitch.
bug.body: Dupe glitch. When using the QIO Dashboard. Simply press both the left and right mouse keys rapidly and it item count will occasionally go up by one. Mekanism-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar MekanismAdditions-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar MekanismGenerators-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar MekanismTools-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar

bug.title: Heat transfer of the reactor via heat conductors
bug.body: I think that the function of heat dissipation from a nuclear reactor through thermodynamic conductors breaks the balance, nuclear reactors were originally supposed to be dangerous, there was always a risk of explosion, while through thermodynamic conductors you can give away all the heat, and in any case there will be no risk of explosion. for example: ![reactor](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/66527840/87289458-f46fed00-c4fc-11ea-9c92-698a0f9d59b5.png) this is my reactor transferring heat through the heat conductor to the thermoelectric boiler, it doesn't use any coolant and is 100% safe, in my opinion it should be nerfed. and of course sodium as a coolant is completely unnecessary

bug.title: Thermoelectric Boiler Boil capacity always 0
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. bug.title: Meka-Tool Teleporation Sound
bug.body: Teleporation using the meka-tool is eerily silent. A sound effect would definitely be an improvement to the immersion, I feel.

bug.title: Meka-Tool Teleportation Does Not Work In Fluids
bug.body: #### Issue description: The user cannot teleport to submerged blocks, and cannot teleport to blocks while submerged themself. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Equip a meka-tool with a teleportation unit installed. 2. Attempt to use it on a submerged block, attempted to use it whilst submerged. 3. User is not teleported. #### Version: **Forge:** 32.0.63 **Mekanism:** 1.16.1-10.0.0.423

bug.title: Chemical Crystallizer and Chemical Dissolution Chamber have the same recipe
bug.body: This seems to be caused by the small amount of rebalancing https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/commit/2d64065b35320faafbbf9fd3197db7e88e20f8b7 performed.

bug.title: Slots sometimes don't render
bug.body: This mainly has to do with when slots are being used/rendered as background components rather than actual slots, but sometimes they do not display as they get covered by other elements. For example the "slot" in the Logistical Sorter that is supposed to render where the color button is.

bug.title: Container sync sometimes fails
bug.body: As reproduced multiple times, it appears that sometimes SyncMapper fails on both singe-player and dedicated server instances.

bug.title: Logistical Transporter logic is flawed when disabling connections to closest neighbors
bug.body: Using [this world](https://www.dropbox.com/s/vpcznevf43h4hgk/Mekanism.zip?dl=0) as an example, it appears that when the closest destination inventory has a transporter connection side set to NONE, it will no longer be able to send items to any other destination inventory.

bug.title: Logistical Sorter color button is bugged
bug.body: Clicking or right-clicking the Logistical Sorter ejection color past 'None' will not allow the user to select 'None' again, and no longer wraps around when selecting an out-of-bounds indexed color. Other ColorButton implementations are working fine.

bug.title: Some bolt particle effects are not synced
bug.body: 1. Vein mining effects are not visible to *any* players in dedicated servers. 2. Magnetic Attraction Unit bolt effects are not visible to *other* players in dedicated servers. We should implement a serialization system for bolt effects, and send packets to nearby players whenever they're displayed.

bug.title: [1.15.2] Synching the security access status
bug.body: #### Issue description: The security access alterations made on Security Station are not immediately propagated to the UI and do not seem to take effect in, for example, letting the previously trusted player to open up the teleporter UI of a teleporter owned by someone who now denied access. The previously trusted player is still capable on right-clicking the teleporter and seeing its UI. The access status on the lock icon inside the UIs remains unchanged. Client restart is required for the changes to take effect for the affected payer. This probably affects more than just teleporters, but we've tested only the teleporters for now. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. In a scenario with two players make player A trust player B via the Security Station. 2. Let player A place a teleporter and set it to a private frequency 3. Verify that the trusted player B is capable of opening the teleporter and seeing the private frequencies. 4. Make player A remove the player B from access roles in his Secutity Station 5. Player B is still capable of opening the teleporter UI 6. Restart player B client 7. Player B is no longer capable to access the teleporter UI, which should have been the case from the very moment of player A changing the permissions. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 31.2.5 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.15.2-9.10.7.420

bug.title: Duplication of Energy and liquids
bug.body: #### Issue description: When Universal or Mechanical Cables are moving liquids or energy around in circles, the contents can be duplicated be quickly breaking and replacing the cables. See the video for an example. [Video of this happening](https://youtu.be/R1yh6-18C7Y) Some more info in this [issue](https://github.com/SuperMartijn642/Tesseract/issues/1). #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place two Tanks or Energy Cubes 2. Connect them twice with two separate lines of cables 3. Configure the cables to make the energy or fluid go in a circle between the two Tanks or Energy Cubes 4. Put some energy or liquid into one of the Tanks or Energy Cubes 5. Repeatedly break and place a cable #### Versions: **Forge: 31.2.4** **Mekanism: 1.15.2-9.10.6.419**

bug.title: Logistical Sorter Filter - Priority only matters for the first item pull
bug.body: #### Issue description: Just as the title says. Say I have a material filter set up to gather everything related to stone, so stairs, slabs, etc., but I want the actual normal stone in a chest on it's own. To do that, I set up tag filter using forge:stone to sort all whole, uncrafted stones to a separate chest, and put that filter to the top of priorities. It works as intended, but only if the logistical sorter is handling ONE stack at a time. If I insert multiple stacks, or switch it to single item pulling, it starts alternating between the two rules. So if I have normal andesite, half of it will go into the stone-only chest, the other half will get sorted under the material filter. This has to be a bug right? Or am I just stupid and missing a really obvious way to turn this off? I don't have round robin on, if that means anything. ![setup1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/657943/82040294-b09c6b00-96a6-11ea-9915-8fecca635c86.PNG) ![setup2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/657943/82040372-cad64900-96a6-11ea-873a-1810a41c633b.PNG) ![setup3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/657943/82040475-eccfcb80-96a6-11ea-8e97-d5cfa4c73d7c.PNG) Example with Slate, which is a forge:stone tagged block. Note that I changed the colour of my second filter from red to green after taking the setup screenshots. ![setup result](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/657943/82040604-1ee12d80-96a7-11ea-98d8-b01227d16523.PNG) #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Make any broad filter in a sorter 2. Make a more specific filter that covers an item already covered by the previous filter. 3. Place second filter higher in priority (This step currently makes no differrence other than for the very first item pull). 3. Move a lot of items at the same time. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 31.1.87 **Mekanism:** 1.15.2-9.10.5.418 **Other relevant version:** Valhesia 2 2.2.0a (Modpack)

bug.title: [1.15.2] [9.10.3.416] Digital Miner can be run with zero power, when first placed
bug.body: When you place a digital miner, it doesn't initially require any energy to run. You can define a filter, then start mining, and it will both display 0FE/t in the gui and actually _require_ 0FE/t to mine and pull up items. If you toggle silk touch, change the radius/height, or add an energy/speed upgrade (basically anything that triggers the per-tick value to change), it will display the correct value, and shut off if not enough FE is available. Breaking and replacing the digital miner reset the value to the correct one. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Install forge/minecraft 2. Place a digital miner, this can be done in survival or in creative. 3. Define a filter (I just used a tag filter of *ore*), then start the machine. 4. Observe the listed 0FE/t cost, and how the machine is still actively mining up ores. #### Versions: **Forge:** forge-1.15.2-31.1.74 **Mekanism:** Mekanism, Tools, Generators, Additions, all the latest (1.15.2-9.10.3.416)

Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Had some severe memory leaks in 9.10.2 from leaking lambdas, TNP Limitless 2 pack, so updated to test if the leak is still present in 9.10.3 but now I'm having problems with Universal Cables not transferring power to machines from other mods. Attaching energy cubes directly to the machines works and the universal cables works with Mekanism machines but no other machines that I've currently tested with. Also the flux plugs visually attaches to the Cables if placed down next to them but if instead a cable is placed down next to the flux plug there is no visual update that the flux plug attaches to the cable. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Create new flat world 2. Place down Creative energy cube 3. Place down machine (tried Refined storage controller, Silent mechanics machines and Flux network plugs and points) 4. Connect with Universal Cable (any tier) #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 31.1.74 **Mekanism:** 9.10.3 **Minecraft:** 1.15.2

bug.title: [1.15.2] NPE when non-Mekanism items are charged in a Creative Energy Cube while fully charged
bug.body: #### Issue description: When items are charged in a creative energy cube and are fully charged, the mod throws an NPE. Mekanism items don't show this behavior nor does charging the same items in any of the other Energy Cubes. One thing I noticed, the Creative Energy Cube still allowed fully charged non-Mekanism items to be inserted into the charge slot. The Creative Energy Cube didn't allow fully charged Mekanism items in the charge slot and none of the other Energy Cubes allowed fully charged items from any mod to be inserted into the charge slot so it appears that this is isolated to the Creative Energy Cube. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Obtain a non-Mekanism chargeable item (I tested with a Mining Gadget and a Refined Storage Wireless Crafting Monitor) 2. Place non-Mekanism item in the charge slot of a Creative Energy Cube 3. When the item is fully charged, check the logs #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): Tested both on a Dedicated Server and Single Player game Forge version: 1.15.2-31.1.71 Mekanism version: 1.15.2-9.10.2.415 Mining Gadgets version: 1.3.5 Refined Storage version: 1.8.3 Other mods loaded: Building Gadgets version: 3.3.5 Cucumber version: 1.15.2-3.0.5 Harvest Sprites version: 1.15.2-0.0.1 JEI version: 1.15.2-6.0.0.3 Journey Map version: 1.15.2-5.7.0beta1 McProfilerView version 1.0 Mystical Agriculture version: 1.15.2-3.0.3 Pam's Harvestcraft 2 Crops version: 1.15.2-1.0.3 Pane In The Glass version 1.15.2-1.2.1 Simple Farming version 1.15.2-1.2.7 #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) Log from the dedicated server: [latest.log](https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/files/4588509/latest.log)

bug.title: [1.15.2] Digital miner power consumption doesn't match displayed values
bug.body: There is something funky going on with the energy consumption numbers of the digital miner. Possibly, base energy consumption is correct when you first load a world, but changing anything quickly gets things out of whack. For instance: standard ore filter, radius of 32, mining from 0-100, silk touch off, when you first log into the game and look, it lists a power usage of "96.41FE/t." Turn silk touch on, and it shows 3.71kFE/t. Turn silk touch back off, and it shows 232.38FE/t. Drop 10 energy upgrades in and nothing changes. Turn silk touch on and off, it now shows a usage of 23.23FE/t, which is a 10x (as expected from the energy upgrades) reduction from before. Log out and back in again, and it shows 96.41FE/t again. Cycle the silk touch button again, and it's back to 23.23FE/t. All that said, the actual usage is in line with the "first logged in" numbers. Actual usage in the above configuration is 96.41 (or 9.64 with the energy upgrades) for no-silk touch. Actual usage with Silk touch on is 385.64FE/t, which jives with the "4x" cost for silk touch that I have in my config. In summary, there are three issues: 1. Energy consumption doesn't properly update when upgrades are placed, until something in the main page changes it (e.g. silk touch toggling). 2. Silk touch is _showing_ a 16x energy consumption increase, not a 4x increase (e.g. the square of my increase value). I tested this with a brand new config, and it did in fact go up to 36x with the default 6x increase. 3. Everything that is shown in the digital miner power usage is off by a factor of ~2.41 compared to actual consumption. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place Digital Miner, energy source 2. Create a config, start the miner. 3. Observe disparities between actual and displayed consumption, observe silk touch causing a visual increase of (increase value)^2 #### Version: **Forge:** forge-1.15.2-31.1.74 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.15.2-9.10.2.415 **Other relevant version:** MekanismTools-1.15.2-9.10.2.415, MekanismGenerators-1.15.2-9.10.2.415, MekanismAdditions-1.15.2-9.10.2.415

bug.title: Valves don't properly update comparator output
bug.body: ### Issue description: Multiblocks do not properly inform any valves to update the comparator output levels when their contents change. The "logic" block of multiblocks should inform all valves to `updateComparatorOutputLevel`. Ideally we will also move the level calculations to the logic block so that way it only has to be calculated once and cached once. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Mekanism:** 9.10.2

bug.title: Math errors result in wrong conversion for Joules/FE in the case of the gas burning generator
bug.body: #### Issue description: Gas burning generator creates an excessive amount of energy due to a conversion error in maths #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Create ethylene gas cylinder piped into a Mek Gas Burning generator. Power outputted from generator into an induction cube (to measure power input) 2. 3. Profit (72krf/t) #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** forge-1.15.2-31.1.63 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.15.2-9.10.1.414 **Other relevant version:** No other mods running for this test Based on the code and configs: ```MekanismConfig.general.FROM_H2.get().add(MekanismGeneratorsConfig.generators.bioGeneration.get().multiply(2L * MekanismConfig.general.ETHENE_BURN_TIME.get())));``` ``` bioGeneration = "350" EthyleneBurnTime = 40 ``` So the math is going to be something like ``350 * (2 * 40)) which comes out to 28000J/t which should convert down to 11200rf/t. However, my induction cell is receiveing 72krf/t which is what you'd get if you multiplied J*2.5 rather than J*0.4. Here are some screenshots which may help: The setup: ![javaw_VOUh4B9mMM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11995956/80870988-96f33080-8c6f-11ea-8602-e781776ed9f0.png) Power produced in Joules ![javaw_9JicTamewD](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11995956/80870979-8f338c00-8c6f-11ea-9353-227a82a80274.png) Power produced in FE ![javaw_24ta5VvoFv](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11995956/80871009-c013c100-8c6f-11ea-8a1e-7b8b29a4a914.png) Power received into the induction cube: ![javaw_PHMT2lR4jf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11995956/80871012-c86bfc00-8c6f-11ea-985d-d2dfe137bcfe.png) #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [No crashlog with this issue] As an aside, I think maybe the config items for J to FE and FE to J may be misnamed and I don't know if this has anything to do with the issue or not: ``` FROM_FORGE = CachedFloatingLongValue.define(this, builder, "Conversion multiplier from Forge Energy to Joules (FE * JoulesToForge = Joules)", "JoulesToForge", FloatingLong.createConst(2.5), CachedFloatingLongValue.POSITIVE); ``` "FROM_FORGE" and "JoulesToForge" are not the same thing but I may not fully understand how that is intended. Cheers.

bug.title: Possible Bug with Industrial Turbines
bug.body: #### Issue description: After upgrading to 1.15.2, it seems that Turbines can't be build anymore. After following construction steps from multiple sites (https://ftbwiki.org/Industrial_Turbine and https://wiki.aidancbrady.com/wiki/Industrial_Turbine) and trying different sizes, I am quite sure, the blocks wont combine into the turbine. I added multiple screenshots showing how I build the turbine. I also made sure, I didn't use vents instead of dispersers. Every other structure is working properly. #### Order I build the Turbine: 1. 5x5 Base of Turbine Casing 2. Shaft with 5 height and 2xRotors on every Shaft 3. Building outer frame and Rotational Complex 4. Pressure Disperser and part of upper Casing 5. Coils and Structual Glass 6. 2 Layers of Vents 7. Finished upper Casing (at this point it should build into the Turbine 8. bug.title: Oredictionificator not remembering which version of ingot/block has been requested
bug.body: #### Issue description: Oredictionificator allows me to set ingots and storage blocks, and it remembers that I want to convert that metal, but the Oredictionificator forgets which mod's version of that metal I want to convert to. I have set seven entries in the Oredictionificator - copper ingot to Mekanism's version, tin ingot to Mekanism, silver ingot to Silent's Mechanisms, copper block to Mek, tin block to Mek, zinc block to Silent's, and silver block to Blue Power. Upon each restart of my world, the Oredictionificator remembers those seven entries but forgets which Mod's version of ore I have chosen to convert to. Additionally, the number of forgotten variables seems completely random. Sometimes upon relaunch, the Oredictionificator forgot which copper ingot I chose to convert to. Sometimes three of the seven entries have forgotten their variable. Sometimes it is five entries that have forgotten which mod's metal I have chosen to convert to. The entries always remain, but the choice of conversion is forgotten. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. All The Mods 5 v1.21 using Mekanism-1.15.2-9.10.1.414 (Both are the most current as of this post) 2. Set some ingots and blocks in Oredictionificator. Choose which mod's ingots and blocks to convert to. 3. Exit game and relaunch. bug.title: Digital Miner Does not continue mining in end dimension
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Items not transferring across dimensions. Checked and made sure frequencies are correct and logistical transporters are configured properly. sucks items out of digital miner just fine. TP back to my home base in the overworld and nothing coming out of the quantum entan. however power is transferring correctly. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place a digital miner with an anchor upgrade in the end (Ensuring it is contained to 1 chunk) 2. Hook up Quantum Entang. and make sure inputs and outputs are configured properly 3. bug.title: [1.15.2] Vanilla hoppers get "stuck" while inserting into Mekanisms bins
bug.body: This issue seems to affect the insertion of items into Mekanism bins by vanilla hoppers; other insertion methods seem to work fine (Mekanism logistical transporters, the factory hopper from Engineer's Decor, etc. all work fine). Starting with a bin that has < one full stack of an item in it (so, <64 for most items, but < 16 for ender eyes, etc.), vanilla hoppers will insert that item until the "one full stack" amount is hit, then will get stuck. Even a hopper that is entirely full of that item cannot insert the 65th item(or 17th, etc. depending on the item). Once something else brings the item total to 65 (some other transfer method, manually placing a single additional item etc.), the hopper transfer resumes, and doesn't appear to stop anywhere else. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a modded game with only Forge and Mekanism. 2. Place a bin (anything except the creative bin, which obviously operates on a different principle) 3. Place a vanilla hopper on any side of the bin (shift-clicking it to 'attach' the hopper). 4. Fill the hopper with > 1 stack of a particular item, say 3 stacks of stone. 5. Observer the hopper steadily filling the bin with stone, then stalling once the bin contains 64. 6. Place a single additional stone in the bin, and watch the hopper transfer resume. #### Version: **Forge:** forge-1.15.2-31.1.46 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.15.2-9.9.20.412

bug.title: Inconsistency with vanilla ores regarding Mekanism's Combiner
bug.body: #### Issue description: I'm reporting a duplication bug that has existed for a while and I can't see anyone else reporting on. Several 'other dimension' cyclic ores that drop multiple items do not work well with the Combiner from Mekanism. For example Redstone Nether Ore can be made in the Combiner using 3 redstone and Netherrack while normal redstone ore requires 16 Redstone and cobblestone. Same thing holds for lapis and both end version of the ores. I tried looking through the code to see which one of the two mods is responsible for this but could not find it. I'm therefore making a new issue on both githubs, the other issue can be found here: https://github.com/Lothrazar/Cyclic/issues/1354 I noticed similar issues were reported before (https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/issues/5636) but I'm guessing this is more of an actual bug then a balancing issues #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place 3 redstone with netherrack into combiner (given you have the cyclic mod) 2. Get 1 Nether redstone ore from combiner 3. Process ore in any way you want to gain more than 3 redstone and repeat #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 14.23.5.2846 **Mekanism:** 9.8.3.390 **Other relevant version:** Cyclic 1.19.20 ![Redstone_ore](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10686466/78034962-bfce9000-7368-11ea-91c9-7b13f6ea82ff.png) ![Nether_redstone_ore](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10686466/78034966-c0672680-7368-11ea-8d0d-7d0fd8d15370.png)

bug.title: Basic Tier Installer not working on Metallurgic Infuser
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Cannot convert a Metallurgic Infuser to a Basic Infusing Factory using shift + click with a Basic Tier Installer. This worked well with an Energized Smelter, Crusher, Enrichment Chamber, etc. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new world. 2. Place a Metallurgic Infuser. 3. bug.title: Combiners factory variants don't have purple input slots.
bug.body: #### Issue description: The combiner (non factory variant) has slots set up like this to add things like cobble. ![2020-02-21_10 01 06](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36657224/74991261-35555f80-5491-11ea-9cb6-fa550e7db810.png) ![2020-02-21_10 01 11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36657224/74991271-3c7c6d80-5491-11ea-8cde-e6a44d625fea.png) This works and allows cobble to be auto inserted. However the factory variants are bugged and don't have this purple option or a purple side config option: ![2020-02-21_10 04 18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36657224/74991385-89604400-5491-11ea-9b9d-fa6d3267d849.png) This means cobble can't be pushed into it and has to be inserted by hand #### Steps to reproduce: 1. build basic combining factory 2. try to setup the side config to have a purple extras input 3. try to automate cobble input 4. cobble will not go in to the machine #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): Forge: 31.1.12 Mekanism: 9.9.10.402

bug.title: Logistical Transporters not predicting future insertion
bug.body: #### Issue description: Logistical Transporters are not predicting future item insertion. Happening with all inventories and tiers. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place Logistical Transporters pulling from an inventory to another 2. Have Transporter pull items from origin inventory 3. When items are traveling to the destination, the transporter will keep pulling items even if future items would fill the inventory #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): latest dev

bug.title: Entangloporter configuration doesn't trigger block updates
bug.body: #### Issue description: Quantum Entangloporters do not trigger block updates to adjacent transmitters when frequency state is updated or side configuration is modified. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place a Quantum Entangloporter and a transmitter (of any type) adjacent. The transmitter should start off disconnected (as the Entangloporter has no current frequency). 2. Set the frequency of the Entangloporter. The transmitter should connect, but it does not unless it is broken and replaced. Additionally, side configuration settings are ignored- transmitters will always connect if a frequency is set (and vice versa), regardless of whether that transport type for a certain side is enabled/disabled in the side configuration. This doesn't happen with other machines. #### Version: latest dev

bug.title: Variable Production rates for machines
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: When a machine does not have enough material or energy for it's own operation, it causes it to stutter which in turn causes huge fps drops. For example, if you have a machine using 150j/t and are only able to supply 50j/t, the machine will start start turning on and off really fast "stuttering" when it reaches enough energy to produce the item. This issue is also prevalent with more advanced tier gas using/producing machines where having different production rates causes multiple machines to stutter (x4 ore processing setup). -an easy way to fix this issue is to add a certain delay to machines so that they are only able to turn on an off once every half second, this helps reduce the load on the computer. -eventually a variable rate production may be implemented where a machine will only produce the amount of material that is needed or at a rate by which the power is supplied -this is similar to the enhancement in #5784 #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge: 31.1.0** **Mekanism: 9.9.8**

bug.title: "None" Connection Type of Logistical Transporter malfunctions with container
bug.body: #### Issue description: During modification over pigman mill I found a bug about a certain layout of logistical transporter and item container will cause some problem: ![2020-02-02_12 03 32_m](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20492252/73609269-03c24480-4607-11ea-9440-33b9cfb1e5f6.png) ![2020-02-02_12 03 24_m](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20492252/73609280-13418d80-4607-11ea-8678-b1c4bf4e3c98.png) This layout can't sort correctly: the middle bin can recieve, but the other two bin recieve nothing - they end in the chest in right. To verify the cause of the issue, I tried another layout, which result is that neither of the three bins recieve correctly, the items all gone to the chest. Now I can conclude that **something is wrong between the chest and the logistical transporter that have a "none" type connection with it.** ![2020-02-02_12 08 21_m](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20492252/73609309-46841c80-4607-11ea-93e5-90298e9b0467.png) I also tried logistical sorter & colored transporter combo, it seems like there's also problem here - all item gone to the blue chest. ![2020-02-02_12 12 22_m](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20492252/73609323-69163580-4607-11ea-8bb9-963d76f0379e.png) #### Steps to reproduce: Set a transporter layout as the pictures, and try their sorting function. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:1.15.2-forge-31.0.1** **Mekanism:1.15.2-9.9.7.399** **Other relevant version:**

As the world loads and it reachs 100% the game exits. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. 2. 3. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge: 31.0.14** **Mekanism: 1.15.2-9.9.7.399** **Other relevant version: java version "1.8.0_241" Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_241-b07) Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.241-b07, mixed mode) ** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/GDf4Bt1s) / etc link here. bug.title: Induction Matrix won't take power from Cables
bug.body: #### Steps to reproduce 1.Build Matrix 2.Hook in energy by cables 3.Nothing **Forge:** **Mekanism:1.15.2**

bug.body: #### Issue description: Using the basic tank in bucket mode allows you to pick up lava without removing the source. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 30.0.43 **Mekanism:** 9.9.3.394.

bug.title: Digital Miner Range not accurate
bug.body: ### Issue description: Digital miner only mines part of the area that is specified. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4283717/73002924-0f428e00-3e05-11ea-931b-4c1f648bedf8.png) #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 30.0.43 **Mekanism:** 9.9.3.394.

bug.title: Fix glow for fluid tank item rendering
bug.body: #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 30.0.50 **Mekanism:** 9.9.3->9.9.4 dev Rendering of things like lava in a fluid tank in first person does not show any glow. This has to do with things now being batched, and our GL changes not being taken into account. We may be able to add the glow vertex data to `MekanismRenderer#renderObject` and the inner methods. It might be worth while to also just fully remove our custom glow handling in exchange for trying to do it via vertex data/just disabling the lightmap if it is a fullbright glow.

Set up digital miner 2. break tree causing snow to fall 3. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 30.0.41 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.15.1-9.9.3.394.jar Pack: [Randomly Added Mods 0.1.1](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/randomly-added-mods) #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) https://gist.github.com/Darkere/cf900c02480e325069b437389a5266eb

bug.title: Bio generator production showed broke
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: The bio generator doesn't show its production while is working #### Steps to reproduce: 1.put a bio-generator 2.fill up with biomass 3.Look production 4. Show 0 J/T #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 30.0.41 **Mekanism:** 9.9.3 **Other relevant version:** 1.15.1 https://imgur.com/a/00lFr4I

bug.title: electrolytic separator, gas generator, energy storage.
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: The electrolytic separator has a weird power usage using upgrades, for example, a stock separator uses 400j/t and produces the same amount in hydrogen that the gas generator is burning. If all 8 energy upgrades are installed, the energy usage is reduced to 40j/t while the gas production stays the same. (energy is produced) Things start to get wacky once speed upgrades are added, once 4 upgrades are installed, the energy produced in hydrogen and used by the seperator are around the same. and then gets really inefficient with all 8 upgrades. I know that hydrogen is supposed to be more of a hydrogen storage rather than a producer. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. connect the seperator to a creative power cube, 2. connect the gas generator to an empty creative power cube 3. connect the hydrogen gas side to the gas generator 4. Install the 8 energy upgrades 5. the energy used, produced values are out of whack Ratios with 8 energy upgrades: 0 speed: 40j-400j, 1000% efficiancy 360j produced 1 speed: 142j-800j, 563% efficiancy 658j produced 2 speed: 506j-1600j, 316% efficiancy 1094j produced 3 speed: 1.8kj- 4 speed: 6.4kj-6.4kj, 100% efficiancy, all energy equals out 5 speed+: inefficient #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** **Mekanism: 9.9.3** **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. Please make sure that it isn't set to expire.]

bug.title: Teleporter not working in 1.15.1
bug.body: ### Issue description: No teleport frequencies are shown in the portable teleporter. Thus making it unusable. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place Teleport Block and power it, give it a name for example "Test1" 2. Give player a portable teleporter and charge it. 3. List in portable teleporter stays empty so you can not use it to teleport anywhere :( #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 1.15.1-forge-30.0.39 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.15.1-9.9.2.393

bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. bug.title: [1.15.1] Cardboard Box doesn't store the block it was placed on
bug.body: #### Issue description: Placing a cardboard box on a block simply replaces the block and doesn't store it. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place cardboard box on a block 2. Attempt to pull off the box again (doesn't work) 3. Break the box 3. Box contains no data #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 30.0.36 **Mekanism:** 9.9.2.393 (Log not relevant)

bug.title: Osmium Compressor stops running if there are more Speed Upgrades than to-be processed items
bug.body: #### Issue description: Test done making Refined Obsidian Ingots (also happens with Refined Glowstone Ingot). If there are more Speed Upgrades installed, than there is in the Input Slot (Extra Slot seems to be unaffected), it will stop processing. If there are 8 Speed Upgrades, it will not run at all #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Add 8 Speed Upgrades to an Osmium Compressor 2. Add 8 Refined Obsidian Dust, and a stack of Osmium Ingots (fuel). It will not run. 3. Remove 1 Speed Upgrade (down to 7), and it will process 1 Ingot, then stop 4. Remove 1 Speed Upgrade (down to 6), and it will process 2 Ingots, then stop 5. It will now only process items if there are more to-be processed items than Speed Upgrades (so remove one, it will process one). It will also not process with 1 to-be processed and 1 Speed Upgrade. At 0 Speed Upgrades, it will process everything just fine #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 30.0.36 **Mekanism:** 9.9.1.392 **Other relevant version:** JEI 6.0.0.1

bug.title: [1.12] something (I'm assuming a mod) is causing Mek to cap it's power at 2^31.
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: I run a server for ATM Remix with some friends and I added some mods. I need help isolating the issue that cropped up. When someone went to use an induction matrix it capped at 2.14G. I've read up a little and someone had a similar issue but they knew what caused it. All I know is somehow the API is capping out at the maximum for rf instead of tesla. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Well I'm trying to figure out but I installed pam's, dragonmounts2 and ceramics. It also could've been that I had railcraft on the server at one point but it didn't work properly so I deleted it. 2. 3. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 14.23.5.2844 **Mekanism:** 9.8.1.383 **Other relevant version:** Latest versions of railcraft, ceramics, pam's, and dragonmounts

bug.title: Multiple wind generator items multiply rotation rate
bug.body: #### Issue description: Multiple wind generators items multiply the rotation rate #### Steps to reproduce: Have multiple wind generator items rendered at once The issue appears to be [this line](https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/blob/3e8d73fe6da0f073610363dbe6e250c0b9eeef37/src/main/java/mekanism/generators/client/render/item/RenderWindGeneratorItem.java#L48), which updates the angle every time the item is rendered.

bug.title: [BUG] Factory fuction swap not working
bug.body: #5547 ## Issue description: Ok, when you make factory block, you can swap machines inside to change how this factory function. You put machine IN, and get previous machine back OUT. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22171136/66646017-993b6200-ec2d-11e9-82f3-49b7df22a01c.png) But when you recieve this machine back it adds empty tag, like this: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22171136/66646091-d99ae000-ec2d-11e9-80d2-36739b256316.png) And this is preventing machine from been placed back in swap slot. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22171136/66646155-0a7b1500-ec2e-11e9-96ae-7ab18ac33b4e.png) Forge: **2826** Mekanism: **Mekanism-1.12.2-9.8.2.389**

bug.title: Induction Matrix bugged power storage. Mekanism Version: 1.12.2-9.8.1.383
bug.body: I am getting a good ways into Enigmatica 2 Expert and started building the induction Matrix to store my power in. I looked at the induction cells and every one of them but the basic shows the same capacity, I went into creative and tested it. When the multiblock structure is complete they all show they store the same power (other than basic again). I even put multiple cells in to test it and the number stays the same. Tested it in a creative world with an ultimate cell and it doesn't show that it is full on the left, but it's current power/capacity is 2.14GRF/2.14GRF and just voiding any extra power. Basic- https://prnt.sc/pgccmt Advanced- https://prnt.sc/pgcd1x Elite- https://prnt.sc/pgcd8u Ultimate- https://prnt.sc/pgcdlz Mekanism Version: 1.12.2-9.8.1.383

bug.title: [1.12] Paxels not dropping Mekanism Ores/Blocks
bug.body: #### Issue description: When you use a paxel to mine Mekanism Ores/Blocks the related item does not drop #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Get a paxel 2. Mine a Mekanism Ore/Block 3. No item will drop #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 14.23.5.2838 **Mekanism:** Using a manual build from commit 02afcd7193604f8c94b02c42235cf836acef0f89 as this resolved a mining speed bug. **Other relevant version:**

bug.title: Machines do not reflect configuration changes from configuration card
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: When using the configuration card to configure machines, the input/output changes are not reflected (verify by using mekanism configuration wand). Opening the UI for the machine makes the changes take effect. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Copy a properly configured machine with the configuration card. 2. Apply the setting to a new machine. 3. Use the configuration wand and see that the input/outputs are not changed. 4. Open the UI and look at the configurations, they will be accurately reflected. 5. Close the UI and use the configuration wand and see that the input/outputs are now changed. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 1.12.2-14.23.5.2838 **Mekanism:** 1.12.2-9.8.1.383 **Other relevant version:** Numerous other mods. If not reproducible, I'll accept that it's one of them causing it. #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [gist/pastebin/etc link here]

bug.title: Induction Cell max energy show incorrect
bug.body: ### Issue description: Advanced Induction Cell show it can store 2.14GJ.But Elite and Ultimate show 2.14GJ too.Even in the Induction Matrix, #### Steps to reproduce: 1.Build a Induction Matrix with Elite and Ultimate induction cell.It will only show maxium 2.14GJ #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:1.12.2-forge1.12.2-14.23.5.2838 **Mekanism:Mekanism-1.12.2-9.8.1.383

bug.title: [1.12] Turbines refusing to form?
bug.body: Something appears to have changed, and turbines now outright refuse to form, even the simplest 5x5x5 or 5x8x5 setups... ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3912867/64029866-c3a6f380-cb88-11e9-966a-09a0f6fcaa33.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3912867/64030019-18e30500-cb89-11e9-8fbf-1bb959b98495.png) - coils in place above the rotational complex - condensers around the complex - outer frame made completely of turbine casing, along with top and bottom surfaces - all other faces either structural glass or casing, no difference - vent and valve presence has no effect - no difference between sizes up to max, nor chunk location - boiler structure completely unaffected, builds normally along side everything else - filling air blocks with glass and removing has no effect, nor does leaving open space in the boiler prevent it from working - thermal evap towers, while they form, will only show water/brine on the NW corner, which could be a correlated structure code issue? **Forge:** 14.23.5, build 2838 **Mekanism:** 9.8.1, build 383 [modlist.txt](https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/files/3560414/modlist.txt) (note that betterfps is disabled)

bug.title: Plastic Fence has no hardness or resistance
bug.body: #### Issue description: Hardness and Resistance aren't defined in BlockPlasticFence.java. In consequence, plastic barriers can be instantly broken by a single empty-handed punch, and are flimsier in the face of explosions than plastic blocks or wooden fences. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place plastic barrier. Punch plastic barrier. Plastic barrier breaks and drops. 2. Place plastic barrier again, and try to blow it up from various distances with TNT. It is flimsier than plastic blocks or wooden fences. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 14.23.5.2838 **Mekanism:** 9.8.1.383 #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) No log necessary. Issue is 2 lines missing from the constructor in BlockPlasticFence.java.

bug.title: Visual bug with bunch of mekanism blocks
bug.body: When ever I look at mekanism blocks with the wrench or when I build a mekanism multiblock the screen turn light blue and wont turn to normal before I look away form the block or destroy the multiblock structure. I am playing the All The Mods 3 Remix. I have tried with a few other texture packs and vanilla texture pack but it doesnt seem to be the problem. ![before](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10479600/63197928-d0ecba00-c081-11e9-8dd6-ed2d35a5cb17.png) before I form the multiblock structure ![after](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10479600/63197932-d2b67d80-c081-11e9-9d7c-1640e38dfa00.png) right after ![before2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10479600/63198051-33de5100-c082-11e9-993b-73dd634dfab7.png) before I look at the energy cube ![after2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10479600/63198057-35a81480-c082-11e9-9052-d515b9f2e233.png) after

bug.title: Evaporation plant causes render bug
bug.body: #### Issue description: When the evaporation plant is constructed and liquid (water) is inserted, the screen goes blank and takes on the current color of the sky. When Optifine is installed, only the UI goes blank and takes on said color. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Construct an evaporation plant. 2. Insert a liquid. In my case it's water, I haven't tested brine. #### Version **Forge:** 1.12.2-14.23.5.2838 **Mekanism:** 9.8.0.381 I can provide a mod list if it would help.

bug.title: Induction cell values when displayed in RF is wrong
bug.body: Hello guys ! When I set the energy in "RF", the induction cell capacity display is wrong : Basic one is 400 MRF, ok. Advanced one is 2.14GRF, ok. But the elite and ultimate one are still at 2.14GRF so that's a big problem, when i put those in induction matrix (elite or ultimate ones), the green charging bar does not display (if we consider that the maximum capacity is 2.14GRF), and the displayed maximum energy is 2.14GRF, even if i have 4 ultimate induction cell. When i set the energy in "Joules", all is OK, it works well. That's very disapointing :/ Tell me if you want some screenshot

bug.title: Purification chamber makes no sound.
bug.body: #### Issue description: The purification chamber doesn't make any sound when running. I presume this is not intended, as its factory equivalents are not affected and play purificationchamber.ogg. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place a purification chamber. Only the base machine is affected; purification factories are not affected by this issue. 2. Feed it energy, oxygen, and any valid recipe input. 3. Make sure it is running and producing output. 4. Purification chamber is dead silent. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): Minecraft 1.12.2 Forge 14.23.5.2838 Mekanism 9.8.1.383 MekanismGenerators 9.8.1.383 #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) latest.log: https://gist.github.com/SiliconEnt/7de5551d62109652b6beb47a6ec59dd9 debug.log: https://gist.github.com/SiliconEnt/e7f9297fa6c7c17a84f7fbe4bbeac16c

bug.title: Ossmium Compressor ratio.
bug.body: All Mekanism machines are based on a 1:8 ratio except the Osmium Compressor which is based on a a 1:8000000000001 ratio which means that every single time you use the machine it ends at 99.99% and jammed up. I have have played with this mod for near a decade (and I love it, I think Aiden made a mod for people who just love to have fun) but this specific issue is not new. I don't even care, I only need a few ingots for high level tech, but it just seems stupid to break your own mechanics and not have machines work correctly. Minecraft has infinite ore, if you decide to make anything more arbitrarily shitty... Bro, why?

bug.title: [Bug report] Mekanism Dumping and Dumping excess ui has been switched around
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Mekanism machines have the wrong ui atacked to Dumping and Dump excess. If Dump excess is selected the machine will dump all, when Dumping is selected the machine with Dump excess. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Right click on a mekanism machine such as the Electrolytic Separator 2. Add water (if Electrolytic separator) and energy 3. Play with the Dump options to confirm that this is a problem on other devices #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Mekanism:** 1.12.2-9.8.0.381.jar **Other relevant version:** All The Mods Remix Version: 1.4.9 [gist/pastebin/etc link here] Picture of UI posted to reddit :https://www.reddit.com/r/allthemods/comments/ck7e5f/bug_report_mekanism_dumping_and_dumping_excess_ui/

bug.title: Nether portals can be broken by hand
bug.body: I'm using the latest update for 1.12.2 and it seems that nether portals can be broken by hand in survival mode and have the stone breaking sound instead of the glass sound you normally get if your break it in creative. Portals also don't give off light anymore.

bug.title: Duplication
bug.body: Mekanism logistical pipes (mainly advanced/elite) cause lootbag duplication when connected to Lootbag Storage block. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Get 1 Lootbag Storage block, 1 advanced/elite logistical pipe, 1 vanilla chest, and a few lootbags to put into storage (just to get something to pull out). 2. Note the lootbag value. Set storage to a bag you can pull out given the lootbag value you've placed into it. 3. Hook up the pipe between the storage block and chest. Set the side of the pipe facing the storage to pull. 4. Observe the multiple bags of the selected type being pulled into the chest and compare to the value being deducted from the storage block. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge: 1.12.2-14.23.5.2807-universal** **Mekanism: 1.12.2-9.7.9.380** **Other relevant version: LootBags-1.12.2-2.5.8.5** [gist/pastebin/etc link here] Lootbag: https://github.com/Malorolam/LootBags/issues/155 Thanks for your time.

bug.title: Basic Logistic Transporter becomes disconnected
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Basic Logistic Transporter becomes disconnected. Items stop going through. Fixed with reconfigurater and then items begin transporting. Pipe IS on the edge of a chunk border. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Happens randomly. 2. 3. #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 14.23.5.2838 **Mekanism:** 1.12.2-9.7.9.380 **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [gist/pastebin/etc link here]

bug.title: Negative energy capacity for network of universal cables
bug.body: #### Issue description: When too many universal cable are placed, the capacity of the energy network goes negative and no energy can flow through. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place down 6710 ultimate universal cables (I used worldedit) 2. Place down one more cable and the capacity of the network becomes negative #### Versions: **Forge:** 14.23.5.2836 **Mekanism:** 9.8.0.381 From what i've seen, i think the problem is here. https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/blob/be8635ba17f8565191a4e8ae5f6d7e485c5aeef4/src/main/java/mekanism/api/transmitters/DynamicNetwork.java#L258 The calculated capacity of the network isn't clamped to the int that it uses. And if i use `MekanismUtils.clampToInt` to clamp it, the problem is fixed (I don't think it's the right function to use though since this is in the api).

bug.title: Teleporter status can desync
bug.body: Status updates are only sent to players within a 40 block radius: https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/blob/0701203bb996160a16805b41dcfec292b665f0cd/src/main/java/mekanism/common/tile/TileEntityTeleporter.java#L165 Instead it should probably be `sendToAllTracking`. How to reproduce: - Have player 1 stand more than 40 blocks away from the teleporter but still close enough for it to be loaded - Activate teleporter with player 2 - Observe incorrect state for player 1 until another update is triggered (Note: I haven't actually tried those steps. I just ran across it while adding compatibility for the teleporter to a different mod.)

bug.title: I am not experienced with this stuff can someone help?
bug.body: [crash-2019-07-11_15.08.20-server (1).txt](https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/files/3383609/crash-2019-07-11_15.08.20-server.1.txt)

bug.title: Mekanism causing crash because of sound handler
bug.body: o guys.. I've been expierencing random crashes and it tells me that the cause is "Mekanism" and "Random things" anyone know what I could do? https://paste.dimdev.org/heqasinoni.mccrash err one "workaround/fix" would be in the config for the client section turn enablePlayerSounds to false and I believe that will stop it (as that should stop the sound events that are crashing from ever being fired). From the looks of it, my guess is that sometimes somehow the player it is trying to play the sounds for is null (might happen if a mob has a jetpack unsure, also unsure how the mob would get the jetpack)

bug.title: Formulaic Assemblicator Bucket Duplication
bug.body: #### Issue description: There is a bug with the Formulaic Assemblicator : All filled bucket in a craft are duplicated #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Make the Crusher craft in the Formulaic Assemblicator 2. Put the Auto-Craft Mode 3. Place all needed items 4. See in the result : 4 empty bucket but you have placed 2 :/ #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:1.12.2-14.23.5.2838** **Mekanism:1.12.2-9.7.9.380** Video Links : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zf5xDJTo4wQ&feature=youtu.be https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_A4K3aZTTHI&feature=youtu.be

bug.title: Personal Chest Dupe Bug
bug.body: #### Issue description: You can duplicate items using two personal chests. #### Steps to reproduce: _1._ Put 2 personal chests in the hotbar. _2._ Open the first, put some items inside, and close. _3._ Now u need to be fast(or have some lag). Open & drop the personal chest, and instantly change your hand to the other personal chest in the hotbar. _4._ It's all. See the video for more info. Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qlaD_9TIa08 #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 14.23.5.2836 **Mekanism:** 9.7.9.380

bug.title: Mechanical pipe not pulling from quantum entangloporter
bug.body: I have the same issue as a previously closed one, #5100 ![mek_entanglo_no_pull](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5643061/60569197-f620a580-9d2b-11e9-9501-0d628ac07378.PNG) As you can see, I have ult mech pipes pulling from a creative tank going into a quantum entangloporter (all sides set as input), then another quantum entangloporter on the same channel (all sides set as output) where ult mech pipes _should_ be pulling and sending water to a fluid trash can. This is not happening. Mods: Mekanism 9.7.8.379 Mekanism: Generators 9.7.8.379 Just Enough Items 4.15.0.268 Extra Utilities 2 1.9.9 Forge 14.23.5.2838

bug.title: Precision sawmill does not accept torches or ladders via automated input
bug.body: #### Issue description: Precision sawmill does not accept torches or ladders via automated input. It work manually, but not via hoppers, etc. All other materials work using automated methods #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Put hopper on top of precision sawmill. 2. Put torches in hopper 3. Headdesk It looks like you didn't add any custom recipe handlers for itemstacks > 1, so it only accepts automated input of itemstacks of 1, which of course breaks the torches and ladders input when automated, or such is my guess when looking at the code.

bug.title: Turbine Valve Game Crash
bug.body: *Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Tried to create Multi block Structure With turbine valves and it crashed the server flat out #### Steps to reproduce: 1.5*5*7 Structure 2.Add valves in anywhere 3.BOOM! crash lol #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): Skyfactory 4 Forge 14.23.5.2838 #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) https://pastebin.com/k1PzCune

bug.title: PRC not accepting Biofuel
bug.body: #### Issue description: PRC will not accept biofuel from logistic pipes, but will accept substrate. Sides are configured correctly, and pipe is pulling from chest with biofuel, but no biofuel is moved into pipes and into PRC. Substrate WILL be pulled into PRC however, which is odd, but means my setup is definably working. This is becoming a problem as I'd like to begin making Ethelene but have to manually put in biofuel to get ethylene, a stack at a time. Hoppers also do not work, nor do other mods transport pipe options, and because substrate IS being inserted, the pipes and the PRC are set up properly. The PRC DOES make ethylene, but I can't automatically insert biofuel. I really feel as if this is due to some other mod I added recently, because I had it working before. Since, I have added and removed a few mods, along with updating everything and started a new world. I have no idea what mod could even affect this. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Hook up a pipe that should pump biofuel into the PRC (PRC can be completely empty of have water/hydrogen in already) 2. Notice the lack of biofuel in PRC 3. Put substrate into chest with biofuel. Watch it go through pipes and into PRC #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** forge-14.23.5.2836 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.12.2-9.7.7.378 **Other relevant version:**

bug.title: Fluid dupe with Inspirations mod
bug.body: #### Issue description: It's possible to create unlimited quantities of any fluid when using both Mekanism and Inspirations. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Put some fluid in a cauldron 2. Attach an elite mechanical pipe to the cauldron, and set it to extract from it 3. "Prime" the pipe by adding fluid to the cauldron until the pipe is full and the cauldron stops draining. This will take 17 buckets: 16 to fill the pipe and 1 more to fill the cauldron 4. Connect the other end of the pipe to something that uses less than 1000mB of that fluid at a time #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:** 14.23.5.2831 **Mekanism:** 9.7.7.378 **Other relevant version:** Inspirations 0.2.4 #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) Nothing appears in the log about the dupe. ---- The cause of this problem is here: https://github.com/mekanism/Mekanism/blob/0d4b50908f1b8a5334b436d243f2cb97b014d687/src/main/java/mekanism/common/tile/transmitter/TileEntityMechanicalPipe.java#L60-L62 First, we call `container.drain(1600, false)` on the cauldron to see how much fluid it will give us. It only has 1000mB in it, so it returns a FluidStack with an amount of 1000. Next, we call `takeFluid(1000, true)` to try to put all 1000mB in the pipe. Suppose that there's 15800mB in the pipe, so it can only hold 200mB more. Now, `takeFluid` will only add 200mB (since that's all that fits), and will thus return 200. Finally, we call `container.drain(200, true)` to remove the fluid from the cauldron. Since the cauldron doesn't have the granularity to remove only 200mB of fluid, that returns 0 and it removes nothing. Our mistake is that we ignore the result of that call and let the fluid be added to the pipe anyway.
